details: Restructured self-hosted runners documentation: moved requirements and supported OS/architectures to a new reference page and added shortTitle metadata.

Secret scanning: updated pattern validity checks for several providers.

This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
